summary: This mod edits Oriella, the bard in Heljarchen Hall
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][center]
[font=Verdana][size=4]Mirz's NPC Replacer Oriella
[/size][/font]
[font=Verdana][/font][/center][/b][/size][center][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]Description
===========

This mod edits [/size][size=2][url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Oriella]Oriella[/url], the bard in Heljarchen Hall.[/size][/font][size=2]

[/size][/size][font=Verdana][size=2]I tried to keep most of her characteristics, just made her a bit prettier :)
[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][size=2]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83472-0-1493074089.png[/img]


Details
=======

-New custom skin and face textures, eyes, brows and hair
-Edited face shape
-Protected
-Changed outfit
-Removed weapon
-Forwarded edits from USLEEP (not required)

Please add screenshots and come back to endorse if you like my mod :)


Incompatibility
===============

Conflict with mods that edits Oriella.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

-If you have met her before you install this, she might not have her new outfit. You can fix it
 with the console: Walk close to her, open console, click her, type resetinventory,
 hit enter (Not fully tested but should work)

Let me know if you find any bugs, so I can try to fix them.


Requirements
============

Skyrim
Hearthfire
Any body replacer that works with UNP textures
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2](Check sticky post in comments for a workaround if you use CBBE)
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]KS Hairdos - Renewal (esp not needed)


Recommended mods
================

SKSE
ENB
USLEEP
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation by towawot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]RUSTIC CLOTHING by Gamwich[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31593/?]Mitigate HDR Eye Adaptation and disable Bloom by carpetbulge[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD - iHUD by Gopher[/url]


History
=======

1.0 25.04.2017 - Initial release

Licensing/Legal
===============

You don't need to ask for permission if you wan't to use this in your mods, but please give credit to me
and other people who's stuff I have used.


[/size][/font][/center]
